attributes.action: If you are opposed to the Government’s NHS reforms and urge The Prime Minister to stop the further expansion of the of the private profit making sector delivering NHS services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now the government has declared that there is no limit to the involvement the private sector in the NHS, yet deny that this is privatisation. Businesses are there to make profit and money allocated for health will invariably be diverted to shareholders as well as to the large administrative costs that go hand in hand with running a market. With the introduction of a more widespread market within the NHS hospitals and health professionals will be forced to compete with each other and private providers to deliver services when in the past there was cooperation. 
The changes and reforms are being implemented without public debate or consultation with healthcare workers.
